attributes.action: Get the FA to sack Steve Maclaren
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, have had enough of the dismal performances of the England Football team on the International playing field. We desire an England manager that will endeavour to inspire our nation through instilling in the team the importance of playing stimulating and exciting football, a manager that will step outside the box and pick players on their current form and influential ability not the same old faces. If the FA won’t listen to the fans of English football then we hope the prime minister will. Steve Maclaren should be sacked as England manager ASAP!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
